SEARCH
Package list

Class ListTest

java.lang.Object
list.ListTest
public class ListTest extends Object
JUnit test class for the List class. Tests all public methods of the generic List implementation. This test class verifies the data structure functionality.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Your Name

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up the test fixture before each test method. Creates new List instances for testing.

    • testEmptyList

      public void testEmptyList()
      Tests an empty list. Verifies that a newly created list is empty.

    • testPushBack

      public void testPushBack()
      Tests the push_back() method. Verifies that elements can be added to the end of the list.

    • testPushFront

      public void testPushFront()
      Tests the push_front() method. Verifies that elements can be added to the beginning of the list.

    • testInsert

      public void testInsert()
      Tests the insert() method. Verifies that elements can be inserted at specific positions.

    • testGetSize

      public void testGetSize()
      Tests the getSize() method. Verifies that list size is correctly reported.

    • testAtValidIndex

      public void testAtValidIndex()
      Tests the at() method with valid indices. Verifies that elements can be retrieved by index.

    • testAtInvalidIndex

      public void testAtInvalidIndex()
      Tests the at() method with invalid index. Verifies that IndexOutOfBoundsException is thrown for invalid index.

    • testRemove

      public void testRemove()
      Tests the remove() method. Verifies that elements can be removed from the list.

    • testContains

      public void testContains()
      Tests the contains() method. Verifies that the list correctly reports if it contains elements.

    • testClear

      public void testClear()
      Tests the clear() method. Verifies that the list can be completely cleared.

    • testConvToStr

      public void testConvToStr()
      Tests the convToStr() method. Verifies that the list can be converted to string array.
